channel.title: Comments on: SQL Advent 2011 Day 8: UNPIVOT
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Limno
item.dc:creator: Limno
item.content:encoded:
Use CROSS APPLY:
SELECT year,QuarterlyProfit,Quarter
FROM YearlyProfit
CROSS APPLY (VALUES (Q1, ‘Q1’), (Q2, ‘Q2′), (Q3,’Q3′),(Q4,’Q4’)) b (QuarterlyProfit, Quarter)
